offers.agentFriendlyTermsAndConditions: "Once the report is successfully generated, your credit card on file will be charged $<%immediate_price%> plus any applicable sales tax, which is non-refundable. Credit score calculated based on the FICO 8 model.  Your lender or insurer may use a different FICO score than FICO 8, or another type of credit score altogether.  Learn more about the FICO 8 scoring model on our website.  Do you authorize ConsumerInfo.com an ExperianÂ®company, to obtain your credit report in order to provide it to you?" (Customer must respond in the affirmative)

placements.disclaimer: Your card will be immediately charged a $<%immediate_price%> fee, plus any applicable sales tax for your Experian membership.
placements.taxFreeTermsAndConditions:
PAYMENT INFORMATION

When you complete your order here, you will begin your membership in Experian IdentityWorks℠ Plus. Your credit card will be charged $<%immediate_price%> today and each year you continue your membership, once you submit your order below. You may cancel your membership and stop the annual billing by contacting us at any time. Cancellations taking place after the first month of membership will be eligible for a pro-rated refund. All cancellations taking place during the first month of membership are not eligible for a refund.

By clicking "Submit Secure Order": I accept and agree to your Terms of Use Agreement, as well as acknowledge receipt of your Privacy Policy and Ad Targeting Policy. I authorize ConsumerInfo.com, Inc., also referred to as Experian Consumer Services ("ECS"), to obtain my credit report and/or credit score(s), on a recurring basis to provide them to me for review while I have an account with ECS. I also authorize ECS to obtain and use the information I provide, and my credit report and/or credit score(s), on a recurring basis to notify me of credit opportunities and other products and services that may be available to me through ECS or through unaffiliated third parties. I understand that I may withdraw this authorization at any time by contacting ECS.

placements.advertisingTerms: Enjoy peace of mind with ID Theft Protection, dedicated fraud resolution services, and the power to lock your Experian Credit Report in seconds. Get the Experian IdentityWorks℠ Plus annual plan for just $<%immediate_price%> a year. You may cancel your membership at any time if not satisfied.
